aboutme.content: Hi, I'm Jeffer Steven, a frontend-focused web developer with expertise in design and software development. My tech stacks include ReactJs, NextJs, Redux, JavaScript, TypeScript, Html, Css, Sass, Tailwind, Postgresql, Sequelize, express, and nodejs. Additionally, I have proficiency in design tools such as Figma, Adobe Illustrator, and Adobe Photoshop. I have completed various projects in my spare time, some of which are available in my portfolio. I'm actively seeking exciting and challenging opportunities to continue growing as a web developer.
